Instructions.Value: The Svantovit infantry fighting vehicle is designed for use with second-line units to deliver a Point of Elementals to the battlefield. Protected by only three tons of ferro-fibrous armor, it must use its 162 km/h speed to avoid being hit. Hover: Fast on open ground and water, slow in rough terrain, not very agile, cannot move through woods. Movement: 10/15 Hex: 300/450 Meters. Armor: Ferro-Fibrous (C) Structure: Structure Values A S Front 70 20 Left 55 20 Right 55 25 Rear 50 20 Turret 55 20 Total 285 120
